block.html:
MC:T1 – Minecraft for Type 1 Diabetes — GITHUB

Type 1 diabetes can be tough. Whether learning to control your own condition, trying to help a recently-diagnosed family member, or just getting your friends to understand, the road to good diabetes management can be difficult, even frustrating at times.

But it doesnâ€™t have to be.

Learn through play

Created by the founders of Magikcraft.io, Minecraft for Type 1 Diabetes (MC:T1) is an open-source Minecraft mod aimed at teaching diabetics and non-diabetics about the condition. We want to leverage the inherent engagement and fun of gaming to help kids (and adults) work through tough topics.

What better game than Minecraft?

With over 74 million people playing every month, Minecraft is the most popular game of this generation. Players as young as 5 can enjoy the easily understood controls, enormous depth and myriad of different play-styles. The huge player-base and ease of access makes Minecraft not only a great gaming experience but a brilliant tool for education, activism and health.
